Trump wants you to believe this is about national security and making America safe. That’s simply false. The ICE raids are about terrorizing our own communities and do nothing to make our country safer.
These ICE raids seek to sow fear and chaos into immigrant communities by tearing apart families and needlessly detaining and deporting people who have been members of our community for years.

The Administration has repeatedly claimed they lack the resources to handle the crisis at the border, yet DHS is now planning to devote resources to increased ICE raids? It’s clear where Trump’s priorities lie.

The Trump administration once again plans to target immigrant families in ICE raids beginning Sunday, July 14. We will continue to push back against these raids, but make sure you know your rights from the @ACLU https://www.aclu.org/know-your-rights/immigrants-rights/ …
